1.content: As Julia and Alex cross the foggy canyon, Alex gets a feeling that he is being watched. Meanwhile Julia, a tall redhead, practices the use of a sword, knows what to do when, and generally does not need her companion's advice. Alex rises before Julia to haul the firewood and generally the manual labor for the trip. After four days Julia informs Alex that they will cross a river to leave the canyon. Alex is anxious for he has heard of a black-armored knight that kills travelers...nonetheless he dutifully scouts ahead for Julia, who promises to catch with him soon to pay if there's a toll bridge. After a half hour, Alex meets the black-armored knight who mocks him saying that of the two (the palace provided him with nobleman's clothes for escort duties) the wife wore the pants! Alex snarls that the knight is an idiotic bigmouth. Then the knight challenges him to a duel and slaps him with a glove as was traditional for such a challenge. Julia
1.title: The Black Knight

11.content: With a yawn, Julia wakes up. Seeing that Alex is not there she figures that he has found a toll bridge and is arguing with the man at the booth. She rides off to meet him on her white horse. She meets Alex and finds him in battle with a black-armored knight! "Ah," sneers the knight, "there's a woman and an attractive one, too. Aren't you ashamed that you're still that she can see you for the weakling are!" "What are you up to?" Julia asks. "A duel!" says the knight. "Let's leave, Alex" says Julia. The Black Knight laughs hysterically "Not only is a WOMAN tougher than you Alex; you also need one to mother you as a grown man!" Alex seethes with fury! Does he obey the princess or continue the duel?
11.title: Julia wakes up

111.content: "I am at your command, M'Lady," said Alex. After half a day the two crossed a shallow point of river. Then they entered Tubertov, a border town of the Klarakov Nation, whose king Julia was to meet. As they walked through the main street of Tubertov they heard "Make way! Make way! The King approaches!" Julia rode off to meet the King but Alex lost her in a crowd; the King approached; and to their surprise his carriage was guarded at the front by none other than the Black Knight! "Who is the Black Knight?" asked Alex. "The King's son, the Prince of Tubertov," said an old woman. "@#$!" cursed Alex. "That jerk won't let me join up with Julia! My journey is therefore at an end; I'll be fired if it is heard I lost Julia; therefore I shall return to my home village!"
111.title: Separated

1111.content: At his home village Alex met Drunk Drucilla at his house. At 12 his parents were killed by Black Plague, at 13 his older brother Maurice then 17 left him; for the next three years Drunk Drucilla became Alex's guardian as promised to Maurice and Alex was now 17 himself. Drunk Drucilla lay in a stupor- vomit laying on her ragged dress. Alex winced and picked up a rag to clean her. As he did so Maurice- his only brother- said, "Hello, Alex!" "Maurice!" shouted a shocked Alex.
1111.title: Home

11111.content:
"Where were you?" said Alex. "Remember Reginald?" asked Maurice. "Yes," said Alex. Reginald and Maurice were childhood rivals. After awhile Alex snuck into Reginald's family's cottage (it had an entrance but no door) and pelted a sleeping Reginald with rotten eggs in his bed! Then Reginald and five of his friends seized Maurice and gave him a rather nasty beating. "Well afterwards I decided that never again could I undergo such a humiliation- therefore I left...with you with Drucilla I could learn to be a man among men...without a dependent I could go anywhere in my quest for manhood...then I went to a town...become a laborer by day and an aide to a prizefighter by night...and now I am tough...with my might and my wit I found Reginald alone and
beat him down and now I have my dignity! Now what's your story?" Alex told him and Maurice whistled and said "Well then today is your lucky day; I have dealt with my humiliation- now I can help you, brother!"
11111.title: A Talk with Maurice

choices: Alex goes back to see what's become of Julia.
111111.content:
Alex stood up. "How can you help me? I've lost Julia, I walked away from a duel with a prince, and now I'm at home cleaning up a drunkard. I have no dignity." Alex spat, Maurice just shaking his head.

"Brother dear, there is much for you to learn." Maurice said, sitting down and propping his feet up. Alex glared. Maurice had grown, oh how he had grown. He carried double swords strapped to his back. His blonde hair cut short and his face has lost the babiness that it had once been famous for. Maurice had become a man.

Alex sunk down to the floor and continued to clean up Drucilla. "You left me here with her." He said, wiping the woman's chin.

Maurice sighed and leaned forward. "What have you learned from her?" He asked.

"Drunkeness only leads to pain." Alex said, turning to glare at his brother.

Maurice smiled. "Good, at least you've learned something." Standing up, Maurice stretched. "Come now, we must leave now if we are to start your training."

"Training? What for?" Alex asked.

"To be a knight of course. What other training could my younger brother go through?" Maurice smiled as Alex's eyes lit up.

"A knight? Me? There's no way, we're not of the right blood!"

"Fool them Alex, that's what we'll do. With me by your side you'll become the best knight to ever roam the countryside." Maurice held out his hand. "Are you with me?"
111111.title: Be a Knight?

choices: accept the money being indifferent over whether Alex dies
112.content: Alex admires Julia but can not tolerate such a belittling comparison! "M'lady," he says, "here is some money; if I die then hire another escort with it; however I must defend my honor!" Julia wonders whether she should pay for another escort at the next nobleman's house or insist on intervening. Does she
112.title: A Point of Honor

choices: Continue the fight for his honor and risk angering Julia
Stop fighting and go with her, in disgrace
1121.content: Julia looks angry, she's starting to look irritated. Unwillng to face a thoroughtly irked Julia, Alex turns around. "Are you so concerned about your honor?" she spits with all the fury of a raging volcano, "that you can't escort ME?" She glares him down, arms akimbo. Part of being a knight is to learn not to challenge everyone to a duel." "But Julia," begins Alex. "Don't you Julia me. You're irreplacable." Sighing in frustration, Alex has to make a choice.
1121.title: An angry woman is not a thing to mess with

11211.content:
"No princess. I have been challeged and I must fight for my honor."

"Fine then Alex." Julia says. "I command you to finish your duty as my escort."

"You would order me about in such a fashion?"

"I would, and I have already done so. Gather your things, I wish to leave now."
11211.title: Orders

11212.content: "Yes, ma'am," said Alex. He walked away. The black-armored knight walked to a nearby tree and picked a cane he had hid in the bush. "Leaving the battlefield once a duel has begun is not permitted for I hate it when I am challenged by prancing cowards!" So saying the Knight rushed to Alex and used the cane to drag back Alex by his neck! Then the Black Knight pulled the cane from Alex's neck after causing him to lose his balance. Thus Alex fell to the ground. "Well, my lady," said Alex, "I can't leave but you have a choice for you will get to stay or else leave depending on what is your wish!"
11212.title: Leaving The Battlefield Is Not Permitted!

choices: The Black Knight takes his helmet off.
112121.content:
"If you must stay, than I shall as well." Julia said. "I will fight by your side."

"I'll not allow a woman to fight."

"I am no mere woman. I am a princess, and I know my way around a battlefield."

"A princess you say?" The Black knight paused, lowering his weapon. "May I ask your name?"

"Julia, what is it to you?" She spat.

"Just wondering if we had friends in the same circle. You see I am a prince."
112121.title: Royals

1121211.content:
Julia didn't regognize the deeply scarred face of the knight. "I do not know you and I won't let you kill my escort" Julia demanded The black armored man shrugged. "what do you have in return to bargain with his life." Julia drew her sword which seemed tiny in comparison to the knight's sword. The knight frowned and looked at the two "It looks more like you're the one protecting him. Where did you say you hail from?" As he finished the last sentence he placed his helmet back atop his head. "Durringham castle" she responded

The knight smirked "Is that so? well I'll offer you a trade" I will fight your 'escort' with training swords. If I am to win then I will travel with you for as long as I like." Julia knew the knight had something planned and was about to object when Alex interrupted. "It's a deal"
1121211.title: The Knight's challenge

1122.content: As Julia rode away in the direction of the kingdom,Alex and the Black Knight fought ferociously. The Black Knight slashed and Alex dodged. Then as Alex was in the act of cuting the knight's head off, the knight kicked Alex, grabbed his Alex's sword , and cut off Alex's head with blood and gore reddening the ground. In the mean time Julia rode on... but not for long.....
1122.title: The Black Knight Triumphs!

11221.content: Julia rode and rode. Then when she was about a mile from the kingdom there was bright flash and she was temperarly blinded. Then she felt someone steal her money. A short time later she regained sight- to see that a large sword had blinded her. The sword belonged to the thief. And the thief said, "My name is Benjamin Carthfeld, and now that you can see me...I must kill you!" and so Benjamin attacked.....
11221.title: The Attack

112211.content: "Stop!" screamed Julia and Ben did. "Last wishes...I suppose." Then Julia worked her cunning plan..."I will give you, Benjamin, $5000, if you escort me as far as Klarakov." Ben agreed to these terms and sparked the adventure of a life-time.
112211.title: Benjamin

1122111.content: Once they got to the Black Knight, Ben fought. They fought for over 35 minutes until the Black Knight had Ben with a sword tip by his neck. Then the Black Knight said, "Now, at the moment of your death, I will reveal this dark truth: I am a Prince of Karlakov, Mikhail the Rich." Mikhail was about to stab Ben- but Ben ducked, tripped Mikhail, and stabbed him so that he and Julia at last crossed the old bridge. On the trail they heard a rustling in the underbrush...
1122111.title: The Dark Truth

choices: Ben kills Alex or they leave him standing in the bushes
They bring Alex to a docter to stitch him back up
11221111.content:
Julia stared in fright as she saw Alex stand up, quivering, with his head barely on.

"Please," he said, "I have enough magic in me to reattach my head and live, but I cannot live long without a docter's care, please, bring me to one quickly so I might live to serve you, my princess."

Ben quickly drew his sword, "Oh, I see, you would trick this lovely lady into riding away with you so that you may kill her also!"

"No! I would rather die than kill my lovely Julia!"

Ben turns to Julia to decide what should happen to Alex.
11221111.title: Alex Alive

112211111.author_name: AJ wants U 2 meet The CanMan!
choices: Julia's head goes flying while her neck spews blood.
Julia manages to take the sword from Ben.
112211111.content:
Ben swings his sword and completely decapitates Alex. The force of the sword makes his head fly several feet from his body--but the fickle, spoiled princess is about to get the shock of her life.

Ben is the black knight in disguise, and he now plans to decapitate Julia.

________
112211111.title: Off With Their Heads!

112211112.author_name: AJ wants U 2 meet The CanMan!
choices: he, Ben, and Alex continue in their travels
the three of them decide to stop at an inn for the night
112211112.content: After Alex has been stitched up, ______.
112211112.title: Three On A Journey

11221112.content: Ben and Julia disregard the rustling and tramp ahead. They hear the rustling again and again until a sword pops out of the brush and stabs Ben. Then the wielder of the sword turns on Julia and slays her........and so the story is now at its end.
11221112.title: Your story has been terminated

choices: Is stunned by her beauty and says nothing.
12.content:
She sees the black knight and is stricken with fear. Deep down she secretly loved Alex and she couldn't let anything happen to him.
"Look here, Black Knight," she calls out the the knight who glances at her.
He twirls around in surprise at seeing the beautiful princess holding a sword, ready to attack. He
12.title: Encounter

choices: Alex sneaks up behind the Knight and knocks him out
121.content:
The Knight sees the princess holding the sword and laughs unendingly. His bigotted laughter annoys Julia to the point where she throws the sword at the man and misses by just inches, surprising both the Knight and Alex.
"Where did you learn to throw like that, woman?" The Knight asks gruffly, still shaken from the near death experience.
"You should not refer to a princess in such a matter, knight. I could have your life for this!" She replies, not blinking an eyelash in fear of the Knight's large sword and heavy armor.
121.title: Near Death

choices: The Black Knight hears a horrifing sound and runs.
Julia jumps out of the way just in time and draws a small dagger.
1211.content:
The knight charges after Julia, gripping his massive double bladed sword in both hands.
"Your life is at a end." he snarled.
Raising his blade high above his head he leaps at the frightened princess.
"Julia!" screamed Alex.
1211.title: Unexpected Move.

choices: Alex finally decides to stand up and be a man...
Alex continues to watch in awed love as Julia whups the knight.
12112.content: Julia dodges to the left, easily missing the knight's clumsy attack. Working off of her momentum, she spins towards the knight, flinging a small throwing dagger into his unprotected right calf. The knight screams in surprise and pain, angry at being overtaken so easily by such a small person; a woman at that! He turns, ready for a second attack. The knight has forgotten all about Alex. He charges again, meaning for his sword to find his mark this time...
12112.title: A display of skills

choices: The knight hits Alex on his sword arm, causing him to drop it over the edge
The knight hits Alex on the right, knocking him over the edge of the ledge
121121.content:
As the knights sword flies towards Julia's unprotected left side, his sword is met in the air by another. Alex had gotten up, drawn his sword and joined the battle.
"I believe a challenge has been issued," said Alex "Your duty is to honor it, by attacking the princess, you have changed the whole contest, this is now a duel to the death."
Alex disengaged and spun around to the knights other side, thrusting his sword at the knights right flank. Again the knight parried. Sparks flew from their swords as each one tried to gain an advantage over the other. Alex disengaged and backed onto the bridge. He stood up on the ledge at the side of the stone bridge, to his left was a sheer drop to the rocks below. The knight ran after him onto the bridge and he too climbed onto the ledge. The fight continued.
121121.title: Alex finally decides to stand up and be a man...

choices: Julia blocks the sword before it hits Alex
1211211.content: As Alex starts to push the knight back, the knight's sword connects with Alex's sword arm, causing him to lose his grip on it. It fell over the edge and down into the rushing water below. The knight smiled in victory and raised his sword over his head.
1211211.title: The knight hits Alex on his sword arm, causing ...

12112111.content:
Alex closes his eyes and steels himself for his death, but it never comes. The swift steel of his enemy's blade is staved off at the last possible second with a clang and a grunt, and when he opens his eyes he sees the lovely princess between he and the knight.

It takes all of Julia's strength to halt the blow, and still the sword manages to bite into her shoulder before it loses momentum. She grits her teeth and shoves her opponent back a step, trying to force him into a defensive stance. Normally she would rely on her cat-like quickness to dodge and weave and counter, but tasked with keeping the knight from splitting Alex's head in two she is not afforded that opportunity. Searching for a chink in the knight's armor, she jabs at his knee. It's no good, as the knight's sword deflects the blow, but quick as lightning she brings her dagger up under his breast plate and feels the blade cut through flesh. The wound isn't deep, but it's satisfying.

Julia grins in triumph and readies herself for another attack, but in her haste to defend Alex she has forgotten her defense, and the knight's sword plunges into her belly. The pretty young princess is run clean through, and her shocking blue eyes go wide with astonishment. It's a fatal blow, one that Julia knows will bring a premature end to her painfully brief existence, and she drops her dagger and wraps her fingers tentatively around the blade.

"Stupid girl," the knight laughs, "get off my sword." He withdraws the blade from her guts and Julia slumps to the ground.
12112111.title: Julia blocks the sword before it hits Alex

choices: As they approach the desert, Alex suggests they camp and rest
There is no time to spare and they continue onward...
12112112.content:
Alex closes his as the blade comes down to split his face open. In what feels like this long last moments of his life, he is ready to die but sorry to have let down Julia. But instead of feeling the cut of a sharp sword, he hears a yelp and quickly opens his eyes again. The black knight is gone.

A few feet away from the scene of his interrupted beheading, Julia is standing with her hands lifted up into the air. She moves them around and a swirl of something bright passes around her fingers. Alex looks up and sees the black knight flailing around in the sky, like a fish caught on a lure. He is screaming profanities, unheard because of how high he is up in the air. Julia looks concentrated and Alex doesn't want to interrupt her. So the rumors were dream! But why would they choose him for such an important mission? He had messed up every change he got. Including this one already!

"Alex!" The sorceress cries out to him with a tone of excitement and fear. "I am sorry for not telling you. They told me not to tell anyone back at the castle. I can't even use my powers properly!"

He looks in awe as she tries to figure out what to do with the floating knight.

"That is okay," he says. "I knew there was something different about you when you threw knives at that guy! I have an idea..." Alex points over the ledge of the bridge. The river below is flowing rapidly and although he isn't sure it can rid the knight for good, it would definitely keep him off their trail for awhile.

Julia nods and waves a hand. The black knight comes falling from the sky, screaming for dear life and begging, only to stop when the heavy armor explodes violently into the water. They do not even look back as they continue on their journey. Alex can tell that Julia is affected by what she had done. Even he hadn't killed before. Maybe they could take a break just for her sake....
12112112.title: Taking out the trash

choices: A new day in a strange town
Julia feels uneasy about going to town
121121122.content:
Alex is still astounded by what he saw Julia do. Then she has another surprise for him. She closes her eyes, mumbles something under her breath, and the water from the river under the bridge thickens as it freezes over. He feels a coolness coming into his lungs from the sudden change of temperature. This time however, he notices that Julia is more drained from the spell. "Sorry, just wanted to show off a bit." She grins.

"Princess, I really would've liked to stop so you could rest..."

"But there is no time, I understand. We'll keep going. I have one more spell I can do before I am done for the day."

She comes up from behind him and puts her hands on his temple. He feels something warm and comforting touching his skin. Although he is slightly bruised and beaten, Julia's healing spell is quick, effective, and Alex feels incredibly blessed that he has her on his side. "Amazing..." He says so softly that he doesn't even think she hears him.

With the cool air of the frozen river staying around, they continue walking over the bridge, past the crop fields, until they see the smoke rising up from the chimneys of a nearby town.

"Do you recognize that place, Alex?" Julia says. Having spent most of her time in the castle, she is slightly more sheltered than him. The aspiring knight however doesn't have an answer.

"We need to disguise you more if we're going to pass through. Save your power, I have an idea." Alex bends to the ground and dirties his fingers with ash and mud. He makes some streaks on Julia's cheek, touching her soft skin and trying not to stay on the though. He scuffs up her cloak and makes her look more like a traveling peasant than a member of royalty in disguise.

"There we go, nobody will mind us now..."
121121122.title: Rejuvenation

1212.content:
The knight charged for the girl, who had her
sword drawn with a determined look etched in
her intense eyes. Alex let out a yell and
pounced on the charging knight, yanking the
helmet from his head and cuffing him with the
pommel of his sword. Breathing heavily, he
moved to touch Julia's face. She smiled,
relieved and helped Alex up. Suddenly, a host
of heavily armed barbarians appeared over
the hill, their eyes fixed on the once victorious
couple.
1212.title: Victory...or not

choices: Pointed at Julia and his men took her prisoner, leaving Alex behind.
Stepped around Julia and Alex, leaving them unharmed.
12121.content: There was not enough time for Alex and Julia to escape, so the two of them laid down their weapons and held their hands up in surrender. The barbarians approached slowly and stood before them, glaring at them, but looking over them carefully. The leader of the group leaned over and conversed with the man next to him in hushed tones. Julia gripped Alex's arm in fright, her nails scratching his skin. The leader stepped forward and ...
12121.title: Surrender

choices: Alex tries to regain his dignity...
Alex remains in the corner, panting and whimpering...
12122.content:
Julia actually had moral objections to running. But then again she had many more moral and otherwise objections to being outnumbered by hillmen about twenty to one. So dear Julia decided to leg it and Alex, remembering that he had to escort Julia, followed her. The author would like to note that Alex was sweating substantially and did not voice any objections to running away. Maybe those years of mockery might have been slightly deserved because, in addition to having chicken legs beneath his conspicuously wide trousers, Alex seemed to be chicken through and through.

Julia dived into a bush, rolling as she leaped, and managed to flip onto her feet, body tense as she listened to the sounds of hooves charging over the delightful noise of Alex rolling head over heels down a rather steep incline that the bush had hidden. "Oh shut up, would you?"

"That's hardly any way for a diplomat princess to talk!" Alex huffed, his pride rather wounded by his rather cowardly flight, his flailing arms that seemed to fly out in every direction as he ran (and that certainly hadn't escaped the princess's notice), and his climatic and very graceless tumble down the hill.

Julia sighed and sat down. "They've ridden past. You can stop quivering."
12122.title: Flight

121221.content:
"I was going to fight!" Alex exclaimed dejectedly.
"... I just, was... going to take them by surprise."

Julia begans to walk, testing out her shaky legs.
"Of course you were." She said patting him on his cheek before continuing to walk. The sun was beginning to sink behind the horizon and they needed to make camp.
Julia jumps, right in her path there lay a....
121221.title: Flight

122.content:
Taking the Black Knight by surprise Julia raises the sword and hits him on the head. The Black Knight stumbles and falls-unconscious from the blow. Alex-stunned, nearly fell down in disbelief.

Julia looked down at her sword then back at the knight and smiled. She was triumphant! Leading the way she continued to cross the river. Alex
122.title: Defeat

choices: They go to get weapons first
1222.content:
"Yes?" Julia smiles sweetly at Alex.

"Um, thanks for helping me" says Alex. The moment is awkward.

"I couldn't let my escort be hurt, could I?" Julia informs him coolly. "Besides, he annoyed me." Alex shuddered in fear, wondering what would happen to him if he annoyed her.

Julia looks at the two separate shops. "You coming? I wonder which one we should go to first."
1222.title: Separating Paths

choices: Starts chanting a spell under his breath
12222.content:
They enter the large, crowded restaurant and sit down at an available table when Julia suddenly goes pale and freezes.
"What's wrong?" Alex asks as he looks around for signs of danger.
Julia whispers, "Do you see that man over there?" She points to a tall, hooded figure sitting in a corner. "He's the former head adviser of magic to my father. He was relieved of his position because he was becoming to attached to the Dark Arts."
"Has he recognized you yet?" Alex asks with renewed concern.
"I fear he has," says Julia as she stands up, as if to leave. "Are you ready to leave?"
"Yes, of course," replies Alex, finally grasping the danger of the situation.
As they're walking to the door the hooded figure
12222.title: They get food first

122222.content:
"Princess Julia," a voice speaks a cold voice from behind Julia and Alex. The two stop in their tracks. "Leaving so soon? Here, come sit down with me. Let's catch up." Julia and Alex look at each other nervously.
"Yes...let's catch up," Julia says cautiously. The two travelers sit go sit down with the hooded man.

"So, what are you doing out of the castle with this young lad?"

"Well Hendrik, Alex happens to be escorting me to Klarakov for a diplomatic meeting. We really must be getting on our way too."

"Not so fast!...
122222.title: Hendrik

choices: they refuse his offer and head off
1222221.content:
"Excuse me?" Julia asks with confusion.

"Apologies my mistress, I should be more clear with my intentions." Hendrik says to her. He then straightens himself, and prepares to say something. "I would like to accompany the both of you on your journey."

"What for?" Alex asks the strange hooded man.

"I have gotten quite bored of this world, still unsure of the secrets it still holds. You see, there are countless perils and mischief at play in this world. I seek to prevent such a turn of events to occur to the Princess, for she may die from such troubles." Hendrik answers. "An event like that would surely spell trouble for you too, knight." Hendrik says as he stares at him. "But with my assistance, I can make sure things go smoothly, while expanding my knowledge of the hidden truths this world has. From my time with handling sorcery, I have acquired such potential and abilities that are useful in many journeys."

"So you wish to be a noble mage?" Julia says.

"I do, but in my own way, of course." Hendrik says.

In the end...
1222221.title: "Let me join you."

12222211.content:
Looking at each other, Julia and Alex quickly agree with each other.

Turning to face Hendrik, Julia says, "All right, but if you plan on trying anything, and I mean anything like trying to kill us, I will make sure you feel the wrath of my blade."

"Agreed, as I dare not try to anger you." Hendrik says.

They decide to stay and eat, telling each other stories of their recent adventures. For Hendrik, he had to see whether or not he could dispel the evil spirits that plagued an old and haunted castle. It was done so by the request of the people. Although he was not a proper medium, Hendrik was able to summon a demon that ate the spirits present with some fleeing to the astral plane. He would then attempt to conjure the spirit of a fallen warrior in order to find answers to a strange relic that once belonged to an evil sorceress who once resided in the old castle.

Alex and Julia told him of their mission to help escort Julia away in order to speak with the rulers of another kingdom. However, they would soon encounter a strange Black Knight, who is veiled under a strange ominous power and moral. They do not know what the Black Knight wants, nor do they know how to truly kill the man.

Hendrik looks at the two.
12222211.title: they allow him to join

info.brief_description: a young man and a princess face a sinister, black-armored knight
info.description: In an ancient kingdom a young man, Alex, escorts the princess Julia on a diplomatic mission. Alex has been employed by the palace and seeks a glorious reputation after years of mockery by others.
